email_confirm.subject: %[1]s, please confirm your email address at Vikunja
email_confirm.confirm: To confirm your email address, click the link below:

changed.subject: Your Password on Vikunja was changed
changed.success: Your account password was successfully changed.
changed.warning: If this wasn't you, it could mean someone compromised your account. In this case contact your server's administrator.

reset.subject: Reset your password on Vikunja
reset.instructions: To reset your password, click the link below:
reset.valid_duration: This link will be valid for 24 hours.

invalid.subject: Someone just tried to login to your Vikunja account, but failed
invalid.message: Someone just tried to log in into your account with correct username and password but a wrong TOTP passcode.
invalid.warning: **If this was not you, someone else knows your password. You should set a new one immediately!**

account_locked.subject: We've disabled your account on Vikunja
account_locked.message: Someone tried to log in with your credentials but failed to provide a valid TOTP passcode.
account_locked.disabled: After 10 failed attempts, we've disabled your account and reset your password. To set a new one, follow the instructions in the reset email we just sent you.
account_locked.reset_instructions: If you did not receive an email with reset instructions, you can always request a new one at [%[1]s](%[2]s).

failed.subject: Someone just tried to login to your Vikunja account, but failed to provide a correct password
failed.message: Someone just tried to log in into your account with a wrong password three times in a row.
failed.warning: If this was not you, this could be someone else trying to break into your account.
failed.enhance_security: To enhance the security of you account you may want to set a stronger password or enable TOTP authentication in the settings:

confirm.subject: Please confirm the deletion of your Vikunja account
confirm.request: You have requested the deletion of your account. To confirm this, please click the link below:
confirm.valid_duration: This link will be valid for 24 hours.
confirm.schedule_info: Once you confirm the deletion we will schedule the deletion of your account in three days and send you another email until then.
confirm.consequences: If you proceed with the deletion of your account, we will remove all of your projects and tasks you created. Everything you shared with another user or team will transfer ownership to them.
confirm.changed_mind: If you did not requested the deletion or changed your mind, you can simply ignore this email.

scheduled.subject_days: Your Vikunja account will be deleted in %[1]s days
scheduled.subject_tomorrow: Your Vikunja account will be deleted tomorrow
scheduled.request_reminder: You recently requested the deletion of your Vikunja account.
scheduled.deletion_time_days: We will delete your account in %[1]s days.
scheduled.deletion_time_tomorrow: We will delete your account tomorrow.
scheduled.changed_mind: If you changed your mind, simply click the link below to cancel the deletion and follow the instructions there:

completed.subject: Your Vikunja Account has been deleted
completed.confirmation: As requested, we've deleted your Vikunja account.
completed.permanent: This deletion is permanent. If did not create a backup and need your data back now, talk to your administrator.

reminder.subject: Reminder for "%[1]s" (%[2]s)
reminder.message: This is a friendly reminder of the task "%[1]s" (%[2]s).

comment.subject: Re: %[1]s
comment.mentioned_subject: %[1]s mentioned you in a comment in "%[2]s"

mentioned.subject_new: %[1]s mentioned you in a new task "%[2]s"
mentioned.subject: %[1]s mentioned you in a task "%[2]s"

overdue.subject: Task "%[1]s" (%[2]s) is overdue
overdue.message: This is a friendly reminder of the task "%[1]s" (%[2]s) which is overdue %[3]s and not yet done.
overdue.multiple_message: You have the following overdue tasks:

member_added.subject: %[1]s added you to the "%[2]s" team in Vikunja
member_added.message: %[1]s has just added you to the %[2]s team in Vikunja.

ready.subject: Your Vikunja Data Export is ready
ready.message: Your Vikunja Data Export is ready for you to download. Click the button below to download it:
ready.availability: The download will be available for the next 7 days.

done.subject: The migration from %[1]s to Vikunja was completed
done.imported: Vikunja has imported all lists/projects, tasks, notes, reminders and files from %[1]s you have access to.
done.have_fun: Have fun with your new (old) projects!

failed.subject: The migration from %[1]s to Vikunja has failed
failed.message: Looks like the move from %[1]s didn't go as planned this time.
failed.retry: No worries, though! Just give it another shot by starting over the same way you did before. Sometimes, these hiccups happen because of glitches on %[1]s's end, but trying again often does the trick.
failed.error: We bumped into a little error along the way: `%[2]s`.
failed.report: Please drop us a note about this [in the forum](https://community.vikunja.io/) or any of the usual places so that we can take a look at why it failed.
failed.working_on_it: We've got the error message on our radar and are on it to get it sorted out soon.

common.copy_url: If the button above doesn't work, copy the url below and paste it in your browser's address bar:

actions.confirm_account_deletion: Confirm the deletion of my account
actions.change_notification_settings_link: You can change your notification settings [here](%[1]s).
